task.title: Fix WebSocket disconnections for workspace instances

events.content: Add ping/pong keepalive to main and bridge WebSockets: Add ping/pong keepalive to main and bridge WebSockets

raw.question: Add ping/pong keepalive to main and bridge WebSockets
raw.chosen: Add ping/pong keepalive to main and bridge WebSockets
raw.reasoning: Main dashboard and bridge WebSocket endpoints were missing ping/pong keepalive, while logs and presence endpoints had it. Without keepalive, TCP/proxy timeouts kill idle connections (typically 60-120s).

retrospective.summary: Added ping/pong keepalive to main and bridge WebSockets to fix connection instability
